sentences.en: Everyone should pay attention to preserving his own eyesight.
sentences.cn: 每人都应注意保护视力.

sentences.en: He had a problem with his eyesight.
He suffered from poor eyesight and could no longer read properly.
sentences.cn: 他视力不好，再也不能正常阅读了。

sentences.en: Her ambition to become an artist was thwarted by failing eyesight.
sentences.cn: 她想成为艺术家的梦想由于视力衰减而破灭了。

sentences.en: Her eyesight grew so bad that she could hardly see.
sentences.cn: 她的视力变得很糟,几乎什么也看不见了.

sentences.en: Her poor eyesight is bound to tell against her applying for a job.
sentences.cn: 她视力不好,必然不利于她找工作.

sentences.en: His bad eyesight exempted him from military service.
sentences.cn: 他因视力不好而免服兵役.

sentences.en: His paintings had become more impressionistic as his eyesight dimmed.
sentences.cn: 伴随着他视力的下降，他的画作变得更富印象派风格。

sentences.en: I was so tired that my eyesight grew dim [ hazy ] .
sentences.cn: 我太累了,眼睛有点 发花.

sentences.en: The brilliance of truth cannot be dimmed ; the eyesight of the mountain eagle cannot be blocked by dense fog.
sentences.cn: 真理的光辉不怕笼罩,山鹰的眼睛不怕密雾.

sentences.en: The myth that eating carrots improves your eyesight was exploded years ago.
sentences.cn: 认为吃胡萝卜可以改善视力的海外奇谈,多年前已祛除殆尽.

sentences.en: Their eyesight is poor in low light.
sentences.cn: 光线很暗时他们视力不佳。

sentences.en: Until the beating, Cantanco's eyesight had been weak, but adequate.
sentences.cn: 挨打前坎坦科的视力就一直很弱，不过也还勉强看得见。

sentences.en: Your eyesight rights itself very quickly.
sentences.cn: 你的视力恢复得非常快。
